The Heart of Quickness

miscellaneous (lvl 6)

item id [id]: 423
reinvigoration [reinvigoration]: 2
resist poison [poisonres]: -5
resist cold [coldres]: +5
advanced aging [aging]: 2
restriction [cannotwear]: cannot be worn by inanimate units
map move bonus [mapmovebonus]: 12
(unremovable [cursed], quickness [quick], won't-be-picked-up [nofind], applies-chest-wound [chestwound])

Requires 10B5F to forge (B2F1)

This heart made from ruby and blood is full of life force and magic power. By replacing a person's heart with this one he will become much quicker and be constantly reinvigorated by the fast flowing blood. The drawbacks are a higher sensitivity to poison and much accelerated aging. A person with this heart will age about four times as quickly as ordinary beings.
